help.content:
📚 *Help Menu:*

`/convert <fromAsset> <toAsset> <amount>` - Convert assets.
`/status <orderId>` - Check order status.
`/help` - Show help.
`/listassets` - List supported asset pairs.
`/addassets <pair1>, <pair2>` - Add supported asset pairs (Admin).
`/removeassets <pair1>, <pair2>` - Remove supported asset pairs (Admin).
`/tradehistory` - View trade history.
`/setlang <en|zh|es|fr|de|it|ja|ko|nl|no|pt|ru|sv|vi|da>` - Set language.
